items.name: Abyssal Mask
items.description:
350 Health
60 Magic Resist
  • Unmake: Immobilizing a champion causes them to take 10% increased damage for 4 seconds.
items.colloq: Nearby enemies take more magic damage
items.plaintext: Nearby enemies take more magic damage

items.name: Archangel's Staff
items.description:
65 Ability Power
500 Mana
  • Awe: Gain bonus Ability Power equal to 3% of bonus Mana.
  • Mana Charge: Strike a target with an Ability to consume a charge and gain 3 bonus Mana, doubled if the target is a champion. Grants a maximum of 360 Mana at which point this item transforms into Seraph's Embrace.

    Gain a new Mana Charge every 8 seconds (max 4).
items.colloq: Increases Ability Power based on maximum Mana
items.plaintext: Increases Ability Power based on maximum Mana

items.name: Ardent Censer
items.description:
60 Ability Power
10% Heal and Shield Power
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Sanctify: Healing or Shielding another ally enhances you both for 6 seconds, granting your Attacks 10% - 30% (based on ally level) Attack Speed and 5 - 20 (based on ally level) magic damage On-Hit.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.
items.colloq: Shield and heal effects on other units grant both of you Attack Speed and their attacks deal additional on-hit magic damage.
items.plaintext: Shield and heal effects on other units grant both of you Attack Speed and their attacks deal additional on-hit magic damage.

items.name: Banshee's Veil
items.description:
80 Ability Power
45 Magic Resist
10 Ability Haste
  • Annul: Grants a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability (40s cooldown).

    Item cooldown is restarted if you take damage from champions before it is completed.
items.colloq: Periodically blocks enemy abilities
items.plaintext: Periodically blocks enemy abilities

items.name: Black Cleaver
items.description:
40 Attack Damage
400 Health
25 Ability Haste
  • Carve: Dealing physical damage to a champion applies a stack of 4% Armor reduction for 6 seconds (max 24% Armor reduction).
  • Rage: Dealing physical damage to a champion grants 5 movement speed per stack of Carve on them for 2 seconds.
items.colloq: Dealing physical damage to enemy champions reduces their Armor
items.plaintext: Dealing physical damage to enemy champions reduces their Armor

items.name: Blade of The Ruined King
items.description:
40 Attack Damage
25% Attack Speed
10% Life Steal
  • Mist's Edge: Attacks apply physical damage On-Hit equal to (10% for Melee users | 6% for Ranged users) of the target's current Health.
  • Siphon: Attacking a champion 3 times deals 40 - 150 (based on level) magic damage and steals 25% Move Speed for 2 seconds (20s cooldown).

    Maximum Mist's Edge damage dealt to monsters and minions is 60.
    Item performance differs for melee and ranged users.
items.colloq: Deals damage based on target's Health, can steal Movement Speed
items.plaintext: Deals damage based on target's Health, can steal Movement Speed

items.name: Bloodthirster
items.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
20% Life Steal
  • Ichorshield: Life Steal from Attacks can now overheal you. Excess Health is stored as a 50 - 350 (based on level) Shield that decays slowly if you haven't dealt or taken damage in the last 25 seconds.
items.colloq: Grants Attack Damage, Life Steal and Life Steal now overheals
items.plaintext: Grants Attack Damage, Life Steal and Life Steal now overheals

items.name: Chempunk Chainsword
items.description:
45 Attack Damage
250 Health
15 Ability Haste
  • Hackshorn: Dealing physical damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 3 seconds. If the target is below 50% Health, this effect is increased to 60% Grievous Wounds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

items.name: Chemtech Putrifier
items.description:
55 Ability Power
20 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Puffcap Toxin: Dealing magic damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds. Healing or shielding another ally will enhance both of you, causing the next damage to enemy champions to apply 60% Grievous Wounds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

items.description:
75 Ability Power
200 Health
20 Ability Haste

items.plaintext: Massive amounts of Cooldown Reduction

items.name: Dead Man's Plate
items.description:
400 Health
40 Armor
5% Move Speed
  • Shipwrecker: While moving, build up to 60 bonus Move Speed. Your next Attack discharges built up Move Speed to deal up to 100 magic damage. If dealt by a Melee champion at top speed, the Attack also Slows the target by 50% for 1 second.

    ''There's only one way you'll get this armor from me...'' - forgotten namesake
items.colloq: Build momentum as you move around then smash into enemies.
items.plaintext: Build momentum as you move around then smash into enemies.

items.name: Death's Dance
items.description:
50 Attack Damage
40 Armor
15 Ability Haste
  • Ignore Pain: 35% (15% for Ranged users) of physical damage taken is dealt to you over 3 seconds instead.
  • Defy: Champion takedowns cleanse Ignore Pain's remaining damage pool, grant you 30% Move Speed for 2 seconds and restore 10% of max Health over the duration.

items.name: Demonic Embrace
items.description:
70 Ability Power
350 Health
  • Azakana Gaze: Dealing Ability damage burns enemies for 1.2% max Health magic damage every second for 4 seconds. You gain 10 Armor and Magic Resist if a champion is affected (+2.5 Armor and Magic Resist for each additional champion affected).

items.name: Divine Sunderer
items.description:
40 Attack Damage
400 Health
20 Ability Haste
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional 10% target max Health physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown). If the target is a champion, restore 50% of the enhanced damage (30% for Ranged owners).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5% Armor Penetration and 5% Magic Penetration.

    Spellblade will deal a minimum of (150% base Attack Damage) damage to units, but no more than (250% base Attack Damage) damage to Monsters.

items.name: Duskblade of Draktharr
items.description:
60 Attack Damage
18 Lethality
20 Ability Haste
  • Nightstalker: Attacking a champion deals an additional (65 + 25% bonus Attack Damage) physical damage (15s cooldown). If dealt by a Melee champion, this Attack also Slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds. When a champion that you have damaged within the last 3 seconds dies, this cooldown is refreshed and you become Invisible for 1.5 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

items.name: Eclipse
items.description:
55 Attack Damage
18 Lethality
8% Omnivamp

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 4% Armor Penetration

25 Magic Resist

  • Snowbind: Attacks create a frost field for 1.5 seconds (4s cooldown). Enemies that move across the field are Slowed by 25% (increased by your max Health).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 100 Health and 6% Size.

60 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance

Active - Cloudburst: Dash in target direction, firing three missiles at the lowest Health enemy near your destination (prioritizing champions). Deals a total of (180 - 220 (based on level) + 45% bonus Attack Damage) magic damage, increased against low Health targets by up to 50% (90s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3% Move Speed.

Maximum missile damage dealt when enemy Health is below 30%.
Cloudburst's dash cannot pass through terrain.

60 Armor
60 Magic Resist

115 Ability Power

    The Ability that triggers Hypershot also benefits from the damage increase. Pets and non-immobilizing traps do not trigger this effect. Only the initial placement of zone Abilities will trigger this effect. Distance is measured from the Ability cast position.

items.description:
45 Attack Damage
30% Armor Penetration
20 Ability Haste
  • Bitter Cold: Damaging Abilities Slow enemies by 30% for 1 second.

items.name: Shurelya's Battlesong
items.description:
40 Ability Power
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen

Active - Inspire: Grants nearby allies 60% decaying Move Speed for 4 seconds. (75s cooldown).
  • Motivate: Empowering or Protecting another ally Champion grants both allies 25% Move Speed for 1.5 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.
    An ally can only be effected by Motivate once every 4 seconds.
items.colloq: Activate to speed up nearby allies.
items.plaintext: Activate to speed up nearby allies.

items.name: Silvermere Dawn
items.description:
40 Attack Damage
300 Health
35 Magic Resist

Active - Quicksilver: Remove all crowd control debuffs (excluding Airborne) and gain 40% Tenacity and 40% Slow Resistance for 3 seconds (90s cooldown).

items.name: Spirit Visage
items.description:
450 Health
40 Magic Resist
10 Ability Haste
100% Base Health Regen
  • Boundless Vitality: Increases all Healing and Shielding effectiveness on you by 25%.
items.colloq: Increases Health and healing effects
items.plaintext: Increases Health and healing effects

items.name: Staff of Flowing Water
items.description:
50 Ability Power
10% Heal and Shield Power
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Rapids: Healing or Shielding another ally grants you both 20 - 40 Ability Power and 20 Ability Haste for 4 seconds.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.
items.colloq: Your heals and shields reduce crowd control and grant movement speed
items.plaintext: Your heals and shields reduce crowd control and grant movement speed

items.name: Sterak's Gage
items.description:
50 Attack Damage
400 Health
  • Bloodlust: Dealing damage to or taking damage from a champion grants a stack, restoring (2% max Health | 1.2% max Health for Ranged champions) over 6 seconds. Stacks beyond the first heal for 50% less.
  • Lifeline: Upon taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a 100 Shield (increased by (8% max Health | 4.8% max Health for Ranged champions) per stack of Bloodlust) for 4 seconds (60s cooldown).

    Bloodlust stacks up to 5 times; 1 per champion. Healing and bonus shielding reduced to 60% for Ranged users.
items.colloq: Shields against large bursts of damage
items.plaintext: Shields against large bursts of damage

items.name: Stirring Wardstone
items.description:
• Arcane Cache: This item can store up to 3 purchased Control Wards.
  • Blooming Empire: This item transforms into Watchful Wardstone once 20 Stealth Wards have been placed.

    Stealth Wards are placed from the Stealth Ward Trinket and the upgraded Unique: Support items.

items.name: Stormrazor
items.description:
40 Attack Damage
15% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
  • Energized: Moving and Attacking will generate an Energized Attack.
  • Paralyze: Your Energized Attack gains 120 bonus magic damage. In addition, Energized Attacks slow enemies by 75% for 0.5 seconds.
items.colloq: Tremendously empower other Energized effects.
items.plaintext: Tremendously empower other Energized effects.

items.name: Stridebreaker
items.description:
45 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
200 Health
20 Ability Haste

Active - Halting Slash: Lunge a short distance and deal (75% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies, Slowing them by 40%, decaying over 2 seconds (20s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).
  • Heroic Gait: Dealing physical damage grants 30 Move Speed for 2 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3% Move Speed.

    Halting Slash's dash cannot pass through terrain.

items.name: Sunfire Aegis
items.description:
350 Health
30 Armor
30 Magic Resist
20 Ability Haste
  • Immolate: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (20 - 40 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 100% against monsters) for 3 seconds. Damaging Champions or Epic Monsters with this effect adds a stack, increasing subsequent Immolate damage by 12% for 5 seconds (max stacks 6).
  • Flametouch: At maximum Immolate stacks, your Attacks burn nearby enemies for your Immolate damage per second for 3 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5% Tenacity and Slow Resist.
items.colloq: High armor. Constantly deals damage to nearby enemies. Immobilize enemies to release a wave of damaging flame
items.plaintext: High armor. Constantly deals damage to nearby enemies. Immobilize enemies to release a wave of damaging flame

items.name: The Collector
items.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
12 Lethality
  • Death and Taxes: Dealing damage that would leave an enemy champion below 5% Health executes them. Champion kills grant an additional 25 gold.

items.name: Thornmail
items.description:
350 Health
60 Armor
  • Thorns: When struck by an Attack, deal (10 + 10% bonus Armor) magic damage to the attacker and apply 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds if they are a champion. Immobilizing enemy champions also applies 60% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

items.name: Titanic Hydra
items.description:
30 Attack Damage
500 Health
  • Colossus: Gain bonus Attack Damage equal to 1% max Health.
  • Cleave: Attacks apply an additional (5 + 1.5% max Health) physical damage On-Hit, creating a shockwave that deals (40 + 3% max Health) physical damage to enemies behind the target.

    Deals 75% for Ranged users. On-Hit damage is also applied to Structures.
items.colloq: Deals area of effect damage based on owner's health
items.plaintext: Deals area of effect damage based on owner's health

items.name: Trinity Force
items.description:
30 Attack Damage
30% Attack Speed
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
  • Threefold Strike: Attacks grant 25 Move Speed for 3 seconds. If the target is a champion, increase your base Attack Damage by 6% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 5 times (Max increase 30% AD).
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (200% base Attack Damage) physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 0 Attack Speed.
items.colloq: Tons of Damage
items.plaintext: Tons of Damage

items.name: Turbo Chemtank
items.description:
350 Health
25 Armor
25 Magic Resist
20 Ability Haste

Active - Supercharged: Grants 60% Move Speed towards enemies or enemy turrets for 4 seconds. Once near an enemy (or after 4 seconds) a shockwave is emitted that Slows nearby champions by 50% for 1.5 seconds (90s cooldown).
  • Immolate: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (20 - 40 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters) for 3 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste
items.colloq: Immobilize enemies to gain a shield. Activate to run faster at opponents.
items.plaintext: Immobilize enemies to gain a shield. Activate to run faster at opponents.

items.name: Umbral Glaive
items.description:
50 Attack Damage
12 Lethality
15 Ability Haste
  • Blackout: When spotted by an enemy Ward, reveal traps and disable Wards around you for 8 seconds (45s cooldown). Your Attacks instantly kill revealed traps and do triple damage to Wards.
items.colloq: Provides trap and ward detection periodically
items.plaintext: Provides trap and ward detection periodically

items.name: Vigilant Wardstone
items.description:
40 Ability Haste
10% Move Speed
  • Arcane Cache: This item can store up to 3 purchased Control Wards.
  • Behold: Increase your Stealth Ward and Control Ward placement caps by 1.

    Requires Watchful Sightstone to purchase.

items.name: Void Staff
items.description:
70 Ability Power
40% Magic Penetration
items.colloq: Increases magic damage
items.plaintext: Increases magic damage

items.name: Warmog's Armor
items.description:
800 Health
10 Ability Haste
200% Base Health Regen
  • Warmog's Heart: If you have at least 3000 maximum Health, restore 5% max Health per second if damage hasn't been taken within 6 seconds (3 seconds for non-Champions).
items.colloq: Grants massive Health and Health Regen
items.plaintext: Grants massive Health and Health Regen

items.name: Wit's End
items.description:
30 Attack Damage
40% Attack Speed
50 Magic Resist
  • Fray: Attacks apply 15 - 80 (based on level) magic damage On-Hit and grant 20 Move Speed for 2 seconds.
items.colloq: Resist magic damage and claw your way back to life.
items.plaintext: Resist magic damage and claw your way back to life.

items.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
items.description:
60 Attack Damage
18 Lethality

Active - Wraith Step: Gain 20% Move Speed and Ghosting for 6 seconds (45s cooldown).
  • Haunt: Gain 40 Move Speed out of combat.

    Ghosted units ignore collision with other units.
items.colloq: Activate to greatly increase Movement Speed
items.plaintext: Activate to greatly increase Movement Speed

items.name: Zeke's Convergence
items.description:
250 Health
25 Armor
250 Mana
20 Ability Haste

Active - Conduit: Designate an Accomplice (60s cooldown).
  • Convergence: For 8 seconds after you Immobilize an enemy, your Accomplice's Attacks and Ability hits apply an additional (30 - 70 (based on level) + 1.5% Health + 7.5% Ability Power) magic damage to that enemy.

    Champions can only be linked by one Zeke's Convergence at a time.
items.colloq: Grants you and your ally bonuses when you cast your ultimate.
items.plaintext: Grants you and your ally bonuses when you cast your ultimate.

items.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
items.description:
65 Ability Power
45 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active - Stasis: You become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (120s cooldown).
items.colloq: Activate to become invincible but unable to take actions
items.plaintext: Activate to become invincible but unable to take actions

runes.name: Absolute Focus
runes.shortDescription: While above 70% health, gain extra <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.longDescription:
While above 70% health, gain an adaptive bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level).

Grants 1.8 Attack Damage or 3 Ability Power at level 1.

runes.name: Aftershock
runes.shortDescription: After <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Immobilize'>immobilizing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> an enemy champion gain defenses and later deal a burst of magic damage around you.
runes.longDescription:
After immobilizing an enemy champion, increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 35 + 80% of your Bonus Resists for 2.5s. Then explode, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

Damage: 25 - 120 (+8% of your bonus health)
Cooldown: 20s

Resistance bonus from Aftershock capped at: 80-150 (based on level)

runes.name: Approach Velocity
runes.shortDescription: Bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> towards nearby enemy champions that are <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>movement impaired</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>, increased for enemy champions that you impair.
runes.longDescription:
Gain 7.5% Move Speed towards nearby enemy champions that are movement impaired. This bonus is increased to 15% Move Speed for any enemy champion that you impair.

Activation Range for CC from allies: 1000

runes.name: Arcane Comet
runes.shortDescription: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.
runes.longDescription:
Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.

Adaptive Damage: 30 - 100 based on level (+0.2 AP and +0.35 bonus AD)
Cooldown: 20 - 8s

Cooldown Reduction:
Single Target: 20%.
Area of Effect: 10%.
Damage over Time: 5%.

runes.name: Biscuit Delivery
runes.shortDescription: Gain a free Biscuit every 2 min, until 6 min. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your max mana and restores health and mana.
runes.longDescription:
Biscuit Delivery: Gain a Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will every 2 mins, until 6 min.

Biscuits restore 10% of your missing health and mana. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your mana cap by 50.

Manaless: Champions without mana restore 12% missing health instead.

runes.name: Bone Plating
runes.shortDescription:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 30-60 less damage.


Duration: 1.5s
Cooldown: 45s
runes.longDescription:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 30-60 less damage.


Duration: 1.5s
Cooldown: 45s

runes.name: Celerity
runes.shortDescription: All <speed>Move Speed</speed> bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain <speed>1% Move Speed</speed>.
runes.longDescription: All movement bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain <speed>1% Move Speed</speed>.

runes.name: Cheap Shot
runes.shortDescription: Deal bonus true damage to enemy champions with <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairAct'>impaired movement or actions</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.longDescription:
Damaging champions with impaired movement or actions deals 10 - 45 bonus true damage (based on level).

Cooldown: 4s
Activates on damage occurring after the impairment.

runes.name: Conditioning
runes.shortDescription: After 12 min gain +9 Armor and +9 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.
runes.longDescription: After 12 min gain +9 Armor and +9 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.

runes.name: Conqueror
runes.shortDescription: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
runes.longDescription:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

runes.name: Cosmic Insight
runes.shortDescription:
+18 Summoner Spell Haste
+10 Item Haste
runes.longDescription:
+18 Summoner Spell Haste
+10 Item Haste

runes.name: Coup de Grace
runes.shortDescription: Deal more damage to low health enemy champions.
runes.longDescription: Deal 8% more damage to champions who have less than 40% health.

runes.name: Cut Down
runes.shortDescription: Deal more damage to champions with more max health than you.
runes.longDescription:
Deal 5% to 15% more damage to champions, based on how much more max health they have than you.

Bonus damage scales up linearly against enemies with 10% to 100% more max health than you.

runes.name: Dark Harvest
runes.shortDescription: Damaging a low health champion inflicts <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and harvests a soul from the victim.
runes.longDescription:
Damaging a Champion below 50% health deals adaptive damage and harvests their soul, permanently increasing Dark Harvest's damage by 5.

Dark Harvest damage: 20-60 (based on level) (+5 damage per soul) (+0.25 bonus AD) (+0.15 AP)
Cooldown: 45s (resets to 1.5s on takedown)

runes.name: Demolish
runes.shortDescription: Charge up a powerful attack against a tower while near it.
runes.longDescription:
Charge up a powerful attack against a tower over 3s, while within 600 range of it. The charged attack deals 100 (+35% of your max health) bonus physical damage.

Cooldown: 45s

runes.name: Electrocute
runes.shortDescription: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.
runes.longDescription:
Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities within 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

Damage: 30 - 180 (+0.4 bonus AD, +0.25 AP) damage.

Cooldown: 25 - 20s

'We called them the Thunderlords, for to speak of their lightning was to invite disaster.'

runes.name: Eyeball Collection
runes.shortDescription: Collect eyeballs for champion <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each eyeball plus bonus upon collection completion.
runes.longDescription:
Collect eyeballs for champion takedowns. Gain an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power, per eyeball collected.

Upon completing your collection at 10 eyeballs, additionally gain an adaptive bonus of 6 Attack Damage, or 10 Ability Power.

Collect 1 eyeball per champion takedown.

runes.name: Fleet Footwork
runes.shortDescription: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.longDescription:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized

Energized attacks heal you for 3 - 60 (+0.3 Bonus AD, +0.2 AP) and grant 20% Move Speed for 1s.

Healing from minions is 20% effective for Ranged Champions.

runes.name: Font of Life
runes.shortDescription: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>Impairing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> the movement of an enemy champion marks them. Your allies heal when attacking champions you've marked.
runes.longDescription:
Impairing the movement of an enemy champion marks them for 4s.

Ally champions who attack marked enemies heal for 5 + 1% of your max health over 2s.

runes.name: Future's Market
runes.shortDescription: You can enter debt to buy items.
runes.longDescription:
You can enter debt to buy items. The amount you can borrow increases over time.

Lending Fee: 50 gold

runes.name: Gathering Storm
runes.shortDescription: Gain increasing amounts of AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> over the course of the game.
runes.longDescription:
Every 10 min gain AP or AD, adaptive.

10 min: + 8 AP or 5 AD
20 min: + 24 AP or 14 AD
30 min: + 48 AP or 29 AD
40 min: + 80 AP or 48 AD
50 min: + 120 AP or 72 AD
60 min: + 168 AP or 101 AD
etc...

runes.name: Ghost Poro
runes.shortDescription: When your wards expire, they leave behind a Ghost Poro. The Ghost Poro grants vision until discovered. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each Ghost Poro and when your Ghost Poro spots an enemy champion, plus bonus upon completion.
runes.longDescription:
When your wards expire, they leave behind a Ghost Poro, which grants vision for 60s. Nearby enemy champions scare the Ghost Poro away.

Gain an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power for every Ghost Poro spawned and when your Ghost Poro spots an enemy champion up to 10 stacks.

After gaining 10 stacks, additionally gain 10 adaptive force.

runes.name: Glacial Augment
runes.shortDescription: Your first attack against an enemy champion slows them (per unit cooldown). Slowing champions with active items shoots a freeze ray at them, creating a lingering slow zone.
runes.longDescription:
Basic attacking a champion slows them for 2s. The slow increases in strength over its duration.
  • Ranged: Ranged attacks slow by up to 30% - 40%
  • Melee: Melee attacks slow by up to 45% - 55%

    • Slowing a champion with active items shoots a freeze ray through them, freezing the nearby ground for 5s, slowing all units inside by 60%.

    Cooldown: 7-4s per unit

runes.name: Grasp of the Undying
runes.shortDescription: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.
runes.longDescription:
Every 4s in combat, your next basic attack on a champion will:
  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to 4% of your max health
  • Heals you for 2% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by 5

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.

runes.name: Guardian
runes.shortDescription: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage based on level, you're both granted a shield.
runes.longDescription:
Guard allies within 350 units of you, and allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While Guarding, if you or the ally take more than a small amount of damage over the duration of the Guard, both of you gain a shield for 1.5s.

Cooldown: 70 - 40 seconds
Shield: 70 - 150 + 15% of your ability power + 9% of your bonus health
Proc Threshold: 90 - 250 postmitigation damage

runes.name: Hail of Blades
runes.shortDescription: Gain a large amount of Attack Speed for the first 3 attacks made against enemy champions.
runes.longDescription:
Gain 110% Attack Speed when you attack an enemy champion for up to 3 attacks.

No more than 3s can elapse between attacks or this effect will end.

Cooldown: 8s.

Attack resets increase the attack limit by 1.
Allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.

runes.name: Hextech Flashtraption
runes.shortDescription:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel, then blink to a new location.
runes.longDescription:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel for 2s to blink to a new location.

Cooldown: 20s. Goes on a 10s cooldown when you enter champion combat.

runes.name: Ingenious Hunter
runes.shortDescription: Unique takedowns grant permanent Item Haste (includes Trinkets).
runes.longDescription:
Gain 10 Item Haste plus an additional 5 Item Haste per Bounty Hunter stack (includes Trinkets).

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

Item Haste affects all items with cooldowns.

runes.name: Last Stand
runes.shortDescription: Deal more damage to champions while you are low on health.
runes.longDescription: Deal 5% - 11% increased damage to champions while you are below 60% health. Max damage gained at 30% health.

runes.name: Legend: Alacrity
runes.shortDescription: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Attack Speed.
runes.longDescription:
Gain 3% attack speed plus an additional 1.5% for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.

runes.name: Legend: Bloodline
runes.shortDescription: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Lifesteal. Weaker earlier but stronger later game than other Legend Runes.
runes.longDescription:
Gain 0.6% lifesteal for every Legend stack (max 15 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.

runes.name: Legend: Tenacity
runes.shortDescription: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Tenacity.
runes.longDescription:
Gain 5% tenacity plus an additional 2.5% for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.

runes.name: Lethal Tempo
runes.shortDescription: 1.5s after damaging a champion gain a large amount of Attack Speed. Lethal Tempo allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.
runes.longDescription:
1.5s after damaging a champion gain 40 - 110% Attack Speed (based on level) for 3s. Attacking a champion extends the effect to 6s.

Cooldown: 6s

Lethal Tempo allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.

runes.name: Magical Footwear
runes.shortDescription: You get free boots at 12 min but you cannot buy boots before then. Each <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>takedown</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> you get makes your boots come 45s sooner.
runes.longDescription:
You get free Slightly Magical Footwear at 12 min, but you cannot buy boots before then. For each takedown you acquire the boots 45s sooner.

Slightly Magical Footwear grants you an additional 10 Move Speed.

runes.name: Manaflow Band
runes.shortDescription:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.
runes.longDescription:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.

Cooldown: 15 seconds

runes.name: Minion Dematerializer
runes.shortDescription: Start the game with 3 Minion Dematerializers. Killing minions with the item gives permanent bonus damage vs. that minion type.
runes.longDescription:
Start the game with 3 Minion Dematerializers that kill and absorb lane minions instantly. Minion Dematerializers are on cooldown for the first 180s of the game.

Absorbing a minion increases your damage by +6% against that type of minion permanently, and an extra +3% for each additional minion of that type absorbed.

runes.name: Nimbus Cloak
runes.shortDescription: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a short <speed>Move Speed</speed> increase that allows you to pass through units.
runes.longDescription:
After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a Move Speed increase that lasts for 2s and allows you to pass through units.

Increase: 5% - 35% Move Speed based on the Summoner Spell's cooldown. (Higher cooldown Summoner Spells grant more Move Speed).

runes.name: Nullifying Orb
runes.shortDescription: Gain a magic damage shield when taken to low health by magic damage.
runes.longDescription:
When you take magic damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a shield that absorbs 40 - 120 magic damage based on level (+0.1 AP and +0.15 bonus AD) for 4s.

Cooldown: 60s

runes.name: Overgrowth
runes.shortDescription: Gain permanent max health when minions or monsters die near you.
runes.longDescription:
Absorb life essence from monsters or enemy minions that die near you, permanently gaining 3 maximum health for every 8.

When you've absorbed 120 monsters or enemy minions, gain an additional 3.5% maximum health.

runes.name: Overheal
runes.shortDescription: Excess healing on you becomes a shield.
runes.longDescription:
Excess healing on you becomes a shield, for up to 10 (+10% Max Health).

Shield is built up from 20 to 100% of excess healing from yourself or any ally.

runes.name: Perfect Timing
runes.shortDescription:
Gain a free Commencing Stopwatch. After 14 minutes, it can be used for a one time Stasis effect.

Each takedown you get shortens this timer by 120 seconds.
runes.longDescription:
Begin the game with a Commencing Stopwatch that transforms into a Stopwatch after 14 minutes. Each takedown you acquire reduces this timer by 120 seconds.

Stopwatch can be used for a one time 2.5 second Stasis effect.

runes.name: Phase Rush
runes.shortDescription: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities grants a burst of MS.
runes.longDescription:
Hitting an enemy champion with 3 attacks or separate abilities within 4s grants 25 - 40% Move Speed based on level and 75% Slow Resistance.

This is increased to 40 - 60% Move Speed for Melee champions.

Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 15s

runes.name: Predator
runes.shortDescription: Add an active effect to your boots that grants a large boost of <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and causes your next attack or ability to deal bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.longDescription:
Enchants your boots with the active effect 'Predator.'

Gain increased Movement Speed, ramping up to 45% Movement Speed over 1.5 seconds, while chasing enemy champions. After ramping up, damaging attacks or abilities to champions end this effect, dealing 40-120 (+0.2 bonus AD)(+0.1 AP) bonus adaptive damage.

Cooldown: 90s-60s.

runes.name: Presence of Mind
runes.shortDescription: Increase your mana or energy regeneration when damaging an enemy champion. Takedowns restore mana or energy.
runes.longDescription:
Damaging an enemy champion increases your mana regeneration by @RegenAmount@ (80% for ranged) mana per second for 4 seconds. All energy users gain 1.5 energy per second, instead.

Takedowns restore 15% of your maximum mana or energy.

runes.name: Press the Attack
runes.shortDescription: Hitting an enemy champion 3 consecutive times makes them vulnerable, dealing bonus damage and causing them to take more damage from all sources for 6s.
runes.longDescription: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 consecutive basic attacks deals 40 - 180 bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive damage</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> (based on level) and makes them vulnerable, increasing the damage they take by 8 - 12% from all sources for 6s.

runes.name: Prototype: Omnistone
runes.shortDescription: Periodically grants a single use of another random keystone.
runes.longDescription:
Periodically grants a single use of another random keystone.

5-3 second cooldown between using a keystone and gaining the next. (9-7 seconds for ranged users)


After 40 seconds of not using a given keystone, Omnistone will re-roll when you exit champion combat.
Aftershock is only available to champions who have learned a basic spell that can trigger it.
Predator is only available to champions who have already purchased boots.

runes.name: Ravenous Hunter
runes.shortDescription: Unique takedowns grant permanent Omnivamp.
runes.longDescription:
Omnivamp: 1.5% per Bounty Hunter stack.

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.

runes.name: Relentless Hunter
runes.shortDescription: Unique takedowns grant permanent out of combat MS.
runes.longDescription:
Gain 5 Move Speed out of combat plus 8 per Bounty Hunter stack.

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

runes.name: Revitalize
runes.shortDescription:
Gain 5% Heal and Shield Power.

Heals and shields you cast or receive are 10% stronger on targets below 40% health.
runes.longDescription:
Gain 5% Heal and Shield Power.

Heals and shields you cast or receive are 10% stronger on targets below 40% health.

runes.name: Scorch
runes.shortDescription: Your first damaging ability hit every 10s burns champions.
runes.longDescription:
Your next damaging ability hit sets champions on fire dealing 15 - 35 bonus magic damage based on level after 1s.

Cooldown: 10s

runes.name: Second Wind
runes.shortDescription: After taking damage from an enemy champion heal back some missing health over time.
runes.longDescription: After taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for 4% of your missing health +6 over 10s.

runes.name: Shield Bash
runes.shortDescription: Whenever you gain a shield, your next basic attack against a champion deals bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> damage.
runes.longDescription:
While shielded, gain 1 - 10 Armor and Magic Resist based on Level.

Whenever you gain a new shield, your next basic attack against a champion deals 5 - 30 (+1.5% Bonus Health) (+8.5% New Shield Amount) bonus adaptive damage.

You have up to 2s after the shield expires to use this effect.

runes.name: Sudden Impact
runes.shortDescription: Gain a burst of Lethality and Magic Penetration after using a dash, leap, blink, teleport, or when leaving stealth.
runes.longDescription:
After exiting stealth or using a dash, leap, blink, or teleport, dealing any damage to a champion grants you 7 Lethality and 6 Magic Penetration for 5s.

Cooldown: 4s

runes.name: Summon Aery
runes.shortDescription: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.
runes.longDescription:
Damaging enemy champions with basic attacks or abilities sends Aery to them, dealing 10 - 40 based on level (+0.1 AP) (+0.15 bonus AD).

Empower or protecting allies with abilities sends Aery to them, shielding them for 35 - 80 based on level (+0.25 AP) (+0.4 bonus AD).

Aery cannot be sent out again until she returns to you.

runes.name: Taste of Blood
runes.shortDescription: Heal when you damage an enemy champion.
runes.longDescription:
Heal when you damage an enemy champion.

Healing: 18-35 (+0.2 bonus AD, +0.1 AP) health (based on level)

Cooldown: 20s

runes.name: Time Warp Tonic
runes.shortDescription: Potions and biscuits grant some restoration immediately. Gain <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>  while under their effects.
runes.longDescription: Consuming a potion or biscuit grants 50% of its health or mana restoration immediately. In addition, gain 5% Move Speed while under their effects.

runes.name: Transcendence
runes.shortDescription:
Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels:
Level 5: +5 Ability Haste
Level 8: +5 Ability Haste
Level 11: On Champion takedown, reduce the remaining cooldown of basic abilities by 20%.
runes.longDescription:
Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels:
Level 5: +5 Ability Haste
Level 8: +5 Ability Haste
Level 11: On Champion takedown, reduce the remaining cooldown of basic abilities by 20%.

runes.name: Triumph
runes.shortDescription: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> restore 12% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.
runes.longDescription:
Takedowns restore 12% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.


'The most dangerous game brings the greatest glory.'
—Noxian Reckoner

runes.name: Ultimate Hunter
runes.shortDescription: Unique takedowns grant permanent cooldown reduction on your Ultimate.
runes.longDescription:
Your ultimate gains 6 Ability Haste, plus an additional 5 Ability Haste per Bounty Hunter stack.

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

runes.name: Unflinching
runes.shortDescription: Gain a small amount of tenacity that increases with missing health.
runes.longDescription: Gain 10% Tenacity and 10% Slow Resist. These values increase by up to an additional 20% Tenacity and 20% Slow Resist based on missing health. Maximum value achieved at 30% health.

runes.name: Unsealed Spellbook
runes.shortDescription: Swap Summoner Spells while out of combat. Swapping to unique Summoner Spells will increase the rate at which you can make future swaps.
runes.longDescription:
Swap one of your equipped Summoner Spells to a new, single use Summoner Spell. Each unique Summoner Spell you swap to permanently decreases your swap cooldown by 25s (initial swap cooldown is at 5 mins).

Your first swap becomes available at 6 mins.

Summoner Spells can only be swapped while out of combat.
After using a swapped Summoner Spell you must swap 3 more times before the first can be selected again.

runes.name: Waterwalking
runes.shortDescription: Gain <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> in the river.
runes.longDescription:
Gain 25 Move Speed and an adaptive bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level) when in the river.


May you be as swift as the rushing river and agile as a startled Rift Scuttler.

runes.name: Zombie Ward
runes.shortDescription: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> on enemy Wards cause friendly Zombie Wards to sprout from their corpses. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each Zombie Ward spawned plus bonus upon completion.
runes.longDescription:
Takedowns on enemy Wards cause friendly Zombie Wards to sprout from their corpses.

Gain an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power for every Zombie Ward spawned, up to 10.

After spawning 10 Zombie Wards, additionally gain 10 adaptive force.

Zombie Wards are visible, last for 120s and do not count towards your ward limit.
